title: Wii Tips & Tricks - Getting started Guide
description:
The Free Nintendo Wii Tips and Tricks Guide mostly for beginners who just bought their Wii or are planning to do so. 

Content:

* Introduction & Accessories

* What Modchips should you choose

* How to Backup your games and Burn using Imgburn and Nero

* How to connect your wireless network

* Wii Game recommendations

* Super Smash Bros. Brawl Mini Guide


Also Included are the software for making Wii game backups:

* Rawdump 2.0 

* Imgburn 2.4.10 


Bonus report: Video Gaming Entertainment

All files are virus checked and tested.
